data.name: HENTAI SEEK / Nude mode
data.detailed_description:
This DLC will allow you to play the character naked.

how to play:
It will be in the naked mode on normal startup.

Features to enter naked mode:
-Title image
Illustration of -8
-Dot character

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.
